feature.label: Jersey Server with BasicAuth Feature
feature.description:
This feature provides the a Remote Service distribution provider based upon the Jersey implementation of the Jax-RS specification. For tutorials, documentation, and examples with ECF's Implementation of OSGi RS/RSA see
https://wiki.eclipse.org/ECF#OSGi_Remote_Services
